languages.text: "Никто не пережил встречи с ними, чтобы описать их. Перепуганные рабочие называют их роем, потому что они ползут по стенам и своду туннеля волной. Они говорят, что враги многочисленны и подобны насекомым. Один из рабочих, коему посчастливилось уцелеть во время атаки, вышел на поверхность. Он сошел с ума от ужаса, но в руках его был разводной ключ, покрытый странной гравировкой. Узор ее в точности повторял тот, что рисовали безумные каторжане на стенах".

"None who faced them have survived to tell the tale. The frightened workers call them a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, has since come up to the surface. The horror drove him mad, but he held a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."
languages.original_text: "Никто не пережил встречи с ними, чтобы описать их. Перепуганные рабочие называют их роем, потому что они ползут по стенам и своду туннеля волной. Они говорят, что враги многочисленны и подобны насекомым. Один из рабочих, коему посчастливилось уцелеть во время атаки, вышел на поверхность. Он сошел с ума от ужаса, но в руках его был разводной ключ, покрытый странной гравировкой. Узор ее в точности повторял тот, что рисовали безумные каторжане на стенах".

traits.locale_text: "No one who met them had survived to describe them. The frightened workers call them a swarm, because they crawl along the tunnel wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, came up to the surface. He has gone mad with horror, but he has been holding a wrench covered with strange engravings in his hands. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts have been drawing on the walls."

"No one who met them had survived to describe them. The frightened workers call them a swarm, because they crawl along the tunnel wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, came up to the surface. He has gone mad with horror, but he has been holding a wrench covered with strange engravings in his hands. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts have been drawing on the walls."

"None who faced them have survived to tell the tale. The frightened workers call them a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, has since come up to the surface. The horror drove him mad, but he held a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, has since come up to the surface. The horror drove him mad, but he held a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

languages.text: “所有见过那些怪物的人都死了。被吓坏的工人称它们为虫潮，因为它们像波浪一样沿着隧道爬行。他们说，敌人数量众多，像昆虫一样。其中一个工人在袭击中奇迹般地活了下来，回到了地面上。他被吓得发了疯，而他手里的扳手上雕刻着古怪的图案，和之前那些发疯的囚犯刻在墙上的图案一模一样。”
languages.original_text: "None who faced them have survived to tell the tale. The frightened workers call them a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, has since come up to the surface. The horror drove him mad, but he held a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

traits.locale_text: “所有见过那些怪物的人都死了。被吓坏的工人称它们为虫潮，因为它们像波浪一样沿着隧道爬行。他们说，敌人数量众多，像昆虫一样。其中一个工人在袭击中奇迹般地活了下来，回到了地面上。他被吓得发了疯，而他手里的扳手上雕刻着古怪的图案，和之前那些发疯的囚犯刻在墙上的图案一模一样。”

languages.text: «Ninguno de los que se han enfrentado a ellos ha sobrevivido para contarlo. Los asustados trabajadores los llaman enjambre porque se arrastran por el túnel como una ola. Dicen que los enemigos son muy numerosos y parecen insectos. Uno de los trabajadores, que tuvo suerte de sobrevivir al ataque, ha salido a la superficie. El horror le volvió loco, pero sostenía una llave inglesa cubierta de extraños grabados. El dibujo era exactamente igual al que los presos locos habían estado grabando en las paredes».
languages.original_text: "None who faced them have survived to tell the tale. The frightened workers call them a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, has since come up to the surface. The horror drove him mad, but he held a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

traits.locale_text: «Ninguno de los que se han enfrentado a ellos ha sobrevivido para contarlo. Los asustados trabajadores los llaman enjambre porque se arrastran por el túnel como una ola. Dicen que los enemigos son muy numerosos y parecen insectos. Uno de los trabajadores, que tuvo suerte de sobrevivir al ataque, ha salido a la superficie. El horror le volvió loco, pero sostenía una llave inglesa cubierta de extraños grabados. El dibujo era exactamente igual al que los presos locos habían estado grabando en las paredes».

languages.text: 「奴らに立ち向かった者は、生き残って話を語れるのは誰一人もいません。恐れおののいた労働者たちは、奴らが波のように坑道を這っていくことから、奴らをスウォームと呼んでいます。敵の数は膨大で、昆虫のような姿だと彼らは言っています。幸運にも奴らの攻撃から生き残った労働者の一人は、その後地上に上がってきたそうです。恐怖で気が狂いそうになったが、奇妙な彫刻で覆われたレンチを手にしていたとのこと。その彫刻の模様は、気が狂った受刑者たちが壁に刻んでいたものとまったく同じだったそうです」
languages.original_text: "None who faced them have survived to tell the tale. The frightened workers call them a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, has since come up to the surface. The horror drove him mad, but he held a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らに立ち向かった者は、生き残って話を語れるのは誰一人もいません。恐れおののいた労働者たちは、奴らが波のように坑道を這っていくことから、奴らをスウォームと呼んでいます。敵の数は膨大で、昆虫のような姿だと彼らは言っています。幸運にも奴らの攻撃から生き残った労働者の一人は、その後地上に上がってきたそうです。恐怖で気が狂いそうになったが、奇妙な彫刻で覆われたレンチを手にしていたとのこと。その彫刻の模様は、気が狂った受刑者たちが壁に刻んでいたものとまったく同じだったそうです」

languages.text: « Aucun de ceux les ayant affrontées n'a survécu pour en parler. Les ouvriers apeurés disent qu'elles leur évoquent des "nuées", parce qu'elles envahissent les tunnels à la manière d'un raz-de-marée. Ils affirment qu'elles sont innombrables et ressemblent à des insectes. L'un des ouvriers, qui a eu la chance de survivre à l'attaque, vient de remonter à la surface. Ce qu'il a vu l'a rendu fou, mais il serrait entre ses mains une clé couverte de symboles étranges dont le motif était exactement le même que ceux que les détenus fous avaient gravés sur les murs. »
languages.original_text: "None who faced them have survived to tell the tale. The frightened workers call them a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, has since come up to the surface. The horror drove him mad, but he held a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

traits.locale_text: « Aucun de ceux les ayant affrontées n'a survécu pour en parler. Les ouvriers apeurés disent qu'elles leur évoquent des "nuées", parce qu'elles envahissent les tunnels à la manière d'un raz-de-marée. Ils affirment qu'elles sont innombrables et ressemblent à des insectes. L'un des ouvriers, qui a eu la chance de survivre à l'attaque, vient de remonter à la surface. Ce qu'il a vu l'a rendu fou, mais il serrait entre ses mains une clé couverte de symboles étranges dont le motif était exactement le même que ceux que les détenus fous avaient gravés sur les murs. »

languages.text: "Niemand hat je eine nähere Begegnung mit ihnen überlebt. Die verängstigten Arbeiter nennen sie einen Schwarm, weil sie durch den Tunnel kriechen wie eine Welle. Sie sagen, es seien endlose Massen insektenähnlicher Kreaturen. Einer der Arbeiter konnte sich an die Oberfläche flüchten. Das Grauen hat ihn in den Wahnsinn getrieben, aber er hielt einen Schraubschlüssel mit einer merkwürdigen Gravur in der Hand. Das Muster war dasselbe, das die wahnsinnigen Sträflinge in die Wände geritzt hatten."
languages.original_text: "None who faced them have survived to tell the tale. The frightened workers call them a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. The horror drove him mad, but he held a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."
